import 'react-app-polyfill/ie11'; import 'react-app-polyfill/stable'; import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = []; let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/output/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/nUtxo/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/utxo-count/sum/day", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/cost-of-tx-volume/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/cost-per-tx/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/fee/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vin/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vin/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vout/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/number-of-vout/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/ratio-of-inout/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/prediction-number-of-transaction/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-size/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-transaction/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/rate-of-change-output/value/month" ]; var tag = [ "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value" ]; var title = [ "Number of transaction", "Average of transaction", "Total transaction", "Total Output of value", "Total UTXO", "Count of UTXO", "Cost of transaction Volume", "Cost per transaction", "Total Fee", "Total number of vin per day", "Average number of vin per day", "Total number of vout per day", "Average number of vout per day", "Average ratio of input to ouput per day", "prediction number of transaction per block", "Rate of change size per day", "Rate of change transaction per day", "Rate of change output per day" ]; var caption = [ "Sum of daily transactions in bitcoin network.", "Average of daily transactions in bitcoin network.", "Total transactions until now in bitcoin network.", "Total output of transactions value in bitcoin network.", "Total utxo per day in bitcoin network.", "Count of utxo per day in bitcoin network.", "Cost of each transactions volume in bitcoin network.", "Cost of each transactions in bitcoin network.", "Total fee for transactions in bitcoin network.", "The total number of virtual input per day", "The average number of virtual input per day", "The total number of virtual output per day", "The average number of virtual output per day", "The average ratio of input to output per day", "predict the number of transaction count in the next Bitcoin Block", "Rate of change for summation of size in a transaction", "Rate of change for number of transaction", "Rate of change for total output in a transaction" ]; class bitcoinTx extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", //mean은 그래프 당 의미가 하나 밖에 없을 때는 사용하지 말것. mean:"Sum of Tx" }; } // 버튼 사용시 사용하는 생성자 setBgChartData = (name1, name2) => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name1, mean: name2 }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Bitcoin Transaction

.

); } } export default bitcoinTx;
